scripts.test:all: npm run test:unit && npm run test:e2e
scripts.test:chartspro: npx playwright test tests/chartsPro.contract.spec.ts tests/chartsPro.cp2.spec.ts tests/chartsPro.cp7.spec.ts tests/chartsPro.cp8.spec.ts tests/chartsPro.compareModes.spec.ts --project=chromium --workers=1 --reporter=line
scripts.test:chartspro:headed: npx playwright test tests/chartsPro.contract.spec.ts tests/chartsPro.cp2.spec.ts tests/chartsPro.cp7.spec.ts tests/chartsPro.cp8.spec.ts tests/chartsPro.compareModes.spec.ts --project=chromium --workers=1 --headed --reporter=line,html
scripts.test:tvui: npm run build && npm run test:smoke && npx playwright test tests/chartsPro.tvUi.*.spec.ts --project=chromium --workers=1 --reporter=line
scripts.test:tvui:headed: npm run build && npx playwright test tests/chartsPro.tvUi.*.spec.ts --project=chromium --workers=1 --headed --reporter=line,html
scripts.test:tvui:deterministic: npm run build && npx playwright test tests/chartsPro.tvUi.bottomBar.spec.ts --project=chromium --repeat-each=10 --reporter=line
